title: Application of the HNC approximation to systems of highly charged hard spheres (micelles)
author: Given name: Denis / Surname: Elkoubi
Given name: Pierre / Surname: Turq
Given name: Jean-Pierre / Surname: Hansen

abstract.sent: The HNC approximation for a solution of charged hard spheres is applied as a model of highly unsymmetrical electrolytes such as spherical polyelectrolytes and micelles.
